title: 【自动电梯】站在有苔藓的碎石上回自动传送到上边的黑曜石上，不用设置，直接使用
author: kv516
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kv516 于 2013-11-16 00:08 编辑 

No config and no command needed! 

Use Mossy Cobblestone as bottom block, and use Obsidian as top. Stand on the bottom block to use!
